page.title: 18GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content:
{ Marbles}is a very popular game in our school during summer. Any number of people can play the game of marbles. We play the Pakistani rules. The game's rules are as follows: { (1) You use a hole in the ground. (2) One of the players shakes the marbles and drops them on the ground. { (3) The players have different {coloured marbles. (4) The player who is furthest from the hole gets the first go. { (5) The other player then aims at the {hole.} (Sometimes they miss the hole. Sometimes they don't aim directly at the hole because they decide to take more than one shot.)
THE PERSON WHO WINS THE GAME GETS ANOTHER MARBLE.
